task.title: Create a power client power session

context.p: Create a CHWRMPower object using NewL() or NewLC() with the required parameters. The parameters are pointers to an object that is derived from MHWRMBatteryPowerObserver.
The following code snippet demonstrates how to create an instance with notify handling for creating the power client session.
The CHWRMPower::NewL() API creates a power session for client and interacts with the battery.
